Text:
At least this download is "not crapped on by
some lame segmenting tools", unlike those from DIMENSION/sceneline. Avoid those downloads for the video files are split into 50MB chunks. Who the hell does that at this day and age?!? It's like those downloads split into x number of 1.44MB floppies. Lulz. Uncool. Uncool uncool uncool.
What happened? 3 episodes in the same day?
